com.didisoft.pgp.mail

Class PGPMailLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.didisoft.pgp.mail.PGPMailLib
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PGPMailUtils

    public class PGPMailLib
extends java.lang.Object
    Library for PGP/MIME email messages Supports PGP/MIME signed, encrypted, signed and encrypted messages and PGP-inline emails

    • Method Detail

      • isIntegrityProtectArchives

        public boolean isIntegrityProtectArchives()
        Checks shall the Modification Detection Code (MDC) be added implicitly when encrypting

        After the EFAIL attack major OpenPGP software implementations require this to be turned on

        The default is true.
        Returns:
        shall the Modification Detection Code (MDC) be added implicitly when encrypting
        Since:
        3.1.3.7
        See Also:
        setIntegrityProtectArchives(boolean)

      • setIntegrityProtectArchives

        public void setIntegrityProtectArchives(boolean integrityProtect)
        Sets shall the Modification Detection Code (MDC) be added implicitly when encrypting

        After the EFAIL attack major OpenPGP software implementations require this to be turned on

        Parameters:
        integrityProtect - if true the modification detection code (MDC) packet will be added when encrypting data implicitly when the methods doesn't have such parameter

        Example: 

         PGPMailLib pgp = new PGPMailLib pgp();
 pgp.setIntegrityProtectArchives(true);
 // now encrypted Emails will be integrity protected even if not specified explicitly
        Since:
        3.1.3.7

      • getAsciiVersionHeader

        public java.lang.String getAsciiVersionHeader()
        Returns the Version comment text that is printed in ASCII armored output
        Returns:
        string of the form "Version: XXX"

      • setAsciiVersionHeader

        public void setAsciiVersionHeader(java.lang.String creator)

        Parameters:

        public MimeMessage encryptMessage(Session s,
                         MimeMessage msg,
                         java.lang.String publicKeyFileName)
                           throws MessagingException,
                                  java.io.IOException,
                                  com.didisoft.pgp.PGPException
        PGP/MIME encrypts a Message
        Parameters:
        s - mail session object
        msg - input MIME message object to be encrypted
        publicKeyFileName - file name location of the OpenPGP public key used for encrypting
        Returns:
        the result encrypted PGP/MIME message
        Throws:
        MessagingException - mail related exception
        java.io.IOException - I/O error
        com.didisoft.pgp.PGPException - encryption error

      • isOpenPGPEncrypted

        public boolean isOpenPGPEncrypted(Message m)
                           throws MessagingException
        Packages up the public keys in a form to be sent as a public key message. public MimeBodyPart createPublicKeyPart(java.security.Key[] keys) throws MessagingException, java.io.IOException, java.security.GeneralSecurityException { MimeBodyPart mbp = new MimeBodyPart(); byte[] keyData = packageKeys(keys); mbp.setContent(keyData, "application/pgp-keys"); return mbp; }

        MessagingException
